description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in UkrSolution Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager: from n/a through 1.5.3.

product.name: Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager
Barcode Scanner with Inventory & Order Manager
